title: Body language in the classroom (TEFC)
creator_credit: International Telefilm Enterprises, Aaron Wolfgang and Robert Wylam
brief_description: Encourages teachers to be aware of body language and shows how it can be applied in the classroom. Offers suggestions on nonverbal behavior for improving communication, including gesturing, pointing, increased eye contact, and other techniques.
